title: Learner-Centered Instructional Design for Online Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Hybrid language instruction linked to professional tasks for working professionals, integrating digital devices in offline settings

learning_goals: Learners can execute at least three communication strategies with peer learners using online collaboration tools
Learners establish and implement personalized learning plans based on learner-centered instructional methods at over 80%
Learners evaluate technological and pedagogical competencies for language learning in digital environments and propose improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
